feed.title: Alex Rdz
feed.subtitle: Dedicated UI designer and JavaScript developer with a passion for smart design and beautiful code.

entry.title: Hola!
entry.content:
My personal site had always been a portfolio site. Changing course now has to do with a few simple facts:

  1. My regular 9to5 jobs keep my pretty busy that I don’t do much freelance work anymore.
  2. Since I have steady employment, I don’t need a portfolio to show potential clients.
  3. Any time I have for freelancing is spent on a joint venture, Tech-Mex, I have going with my friend, George Ramirez.

I’m not exactly sure yet how much time I plan to develop to blogging. At the very least, I hope to motivate myself enough to keep this as a learning journal, chronicling any new bits of information I learn along the way.
entry.summary: My personal site had always been a portfolio site. Changing course now has to do with a few simple facts:
